title: You know money is tight when…
content: You know a job has a tight budget when it has that slick luxury look and the designer is letterspacing Gill Sans light to emulate Gotham.
author: James Puckett

comments.content: Why would anyone who is strapped for cash want to spend money on something that they then have to spend more money to use? (I’m talking about their licence to embed their fonts in pdfs - it must have cost them a few sales).
